conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across Fastly and was impressed with the work you're doing in edge cloud platforms. I'd love to introduce you to our data processing solution that can help optimize your operations and improve performance.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Another sales call. What makes you think we need another data processing solution, Alex? We already have a robust system in place with our edge cloud platform.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your skepticism, but our solution is specifically designed to handle large amounts of data at scale, which is perfect for a company like Fastly that's handling over 1.8 trillion daily requests. Our AI-powered engine can help reduce latency, improve data accuracy, and provide valuable insights that can inform your business decisions.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (interrupting) Look, Alex, we've invested heavily in our current infrastructure, and I'm not convinced that your solution can integrate seamlessly with our existing systems. Plus, we've got a team of experienced engineers who can handle our data processing needs in-house.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about integration and internal capabilities. However, our solution is designed to be modular and can be easily integrated with existing systems, including edge cloud platforms like yours. Additionally, our AI-powered engine can actually augment your team's capabilities, freeing them up to focus on higher-level tasks and strategic initiatives. We've seen similar companies achieve significant ROI and performance improvements with our solution.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) Okay, Alex, I'll give you a few minutes more. But can you give me some specific examples of how DeepData AI has helped similar companies in the past? And what kind of ROI are we talking about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. One of our customers, a leading e-commerce platform, saw a 30% reduction in latency and a 25% improvement in data accuracy after implementing our solution. Another customer, a streaming service, was able to increase their user engagement by 20% after gaining valuable insights from our AI-powered engine. In terms of ROI, our average customer sees a return of 3-5 times their investment within the first year. I'd be happy to set up a demo and provide more case studies to illustrate the value we can bring to Fastly.
